summary: Build a modern, responsive website for “Skill Sync”, a student peer-to-peer skill exchange platform with core pages (Home, Dashboard, Live Class, Skill Match) and UI features like auth screens, credit/feedback displays, animations, and optional dark mode.
architectural_notes: Frontend-only site requested using HTML/CSS/JavaScript (React optional); backend functionality not specified, so auth/credits/feedback are primarily UI/display.
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Modern minimal wordmark logo reading “Skill Sync” on transparent background (skill-sync-logo.dim_512x512.png)
- Abstract soft gradient background with subtle shapes, blue-to-purple, no text (skillsync-bg.dim_1920x1080.png)
- Set of 4 minimal line icons (live class, credits, matching, doubt solving) in a consistent style (skillsync-icons-sprite.dim_1024x256.png)

existing_features.title: Create a responsive app shell with a modern navbar that includes the “Skill Sync” logo, primary navigation (Home, Skill Match, Dashboard), and Login/Logout entry points.

Implement a Home page with: hero heading “Learn. Teach. Earn. Grow Together.”, a short subheading explaining the peer-to-peer skill exchange concept, CTA buttons (“Start Learning”, “Start Teaching”), a Features section (Live Classes, Credit System, Smart Matching, Doubt Solving), a 3-step “How It Works” section with icons, a Testimonials section, and a Footer with social links and contact info.
Create Login and Signup UI flows using Internet Identity for authentication; treat “Signup” as first-time profile setup after a successful Internet Identity login (collect name and skills).
Create a Dashboard page (post-login) with: profile section (Name, Skills, Credits), “Book a Session” button, upcoming sessions list, earned credits display, and feedback ratings summary (1–5 stars).

Create a Skill Match page with a search bar, a set of skill categories (including Coding, Design, Music, Language), and match cards that show rating and credit cost, plus an action to request/book a session.

Create a Live Class page UI with: a video call placeholder area, a session duration timer, a feedback submission form (1–5 stars + comment), and a credit calculation display based on session duration and feedback rating.

Apply a clean, youth-focused visual design across all pages with a soft blue+purple gradient background, card-based layout, modern typography, and smooth hover/transition animations for buttons, cards, and navigation.
Add a dark mode option with a theme toggle that persists the user’s preference and updates the gradient/background and component colors appropriately.

new_feature_requests.summary: Create Home page (hero, CTA buttons, features, how-it-works, testimonials, footer with social/contact) with modern youth-focused gradient design
Create Dashboard page UI (profile with skills/credits, book session button, upcoming sessions, earned credits, feedback ratings)
Create Live Class page UI (video call placeholder, session timer, feedback submission form, credit calculation display)
Create Skill Match page UI (search, categories, match cards with ratings and credit cost)
Add Login / Signup UI screens (no backend specified)
Implement global responsive layout and styling (mobile/tablet/desktop) with clean card-based components
Add modern navbar with logo and site navigation
Add smooth animations, hover effects, and modern UI interactions
Display credit points system and 1–5 star feedback rating UI across relevant pages

Implement backend data models and API endpoints in the single Motoko actor to support: user profile (name, skills, credits), sessions (create/list/update status), feedback (store rating/comment linked to a session), and a deterministic credit calculation function based on duration and rating.
